verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Joys are flowing like a river, Since the Comforter has come; He abides with us forever, Makes the trusting heart His home.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Blessed quietness, holy quietnessâ€” What assurance in my soul! On the stormy sea He speaks peace to me. How the billows cease to roll!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Bringing life and health and gladness All around, this heavenly Guest Banished unbelief and sadness, Changed our weariness to rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Like the rain that falls from heaven, Like the sunlight from the sky, So the Holy Ghost is given, Coming to us from on high.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: See a fruitful field is growing Blessed fruits of righteousness, And the streams of life are flowing In the lonely wilderness.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: What a wonderful salvation Where we always see His face! What a perfect habitation! What a quiet resting place!
